project.description: This project used to publish openeuler website test image publish 【2022-01-10 created】;

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e
GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" #IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) IMAGE_VERSION="v0.0.7" PROJECT_NAME="openeuler-website-test"
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) fi
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com else echo "docker not installed." exit fi
#cd $WORKSPACE #ls #sed -i "s|https://www.openeuler.org/api-cve/|https://cvesa.test.osinfra.cn/|" ./web-ui/docs/.vuepress/config.js #sed -i "114a location /api-cve/ { " ./web-ui/deploy/nginx/nginx.conf #sed -i "115a proxy_pass https://cvesa.test.osinfra.cn/;" ./web-ui/deploy/nginx/nginx.conf #sed -i "116a }" ./web-ui/deploy/nginx/nginx.conf #echo "display nginx.conf" cat ./web-ui/deploy/nginx/nginx.conf #source $WORKSPACE/script/docs-builder.sh #cd $WORKSPACE/web-ui
source $WORKSPACE/script/docs-builder.sh
echo "building frontend server" cd $WORKSPACE/web-ui
sed -i "s|npm install|npm install --registry==https://registry.npm.taobao.org|" ./Dockerfile
docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler-website-test:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler-website-test:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler-website-test:$IMAGE_VERSION
if [ -d "infra-common" ]; then rm -rf "infra-common" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-common cd infra-common/common-applications/test-environment/openeuler-website else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler-website-test:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update openeuler-website-test:$IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi ARGOCD_TOKEN=`curl -X POST -s -d '{"password":"'${ARGOCD_PASS}'","username":"'${ARGOCD_USER}'"}' "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/session"|tail -1 |awk -F '[""]' '{print$4}'`>/dev/null curl -X POST -s -o /dev/null --cookie "argocd.token=${ARGOCD_TOKEN}" "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/applications/${PROJECT_NAME}/sync">/dev/null if [ $? -eq 0 ];then echo "complete!" else echo "failed!" fi
